Subscription Rules ​

Subscription Notice ​

Attention

Before subscribing to these rules, please make sure to read the User Agreement and Usage Guide completely, and confirm that you have the ability to solve certain problems.

The subscription links below are the official version of the AWAvenue Ads Rule, including:

  • GitHub Raw:

The official direct link from GitHub, updated in real-time, with the highest reliability.

  • Tianming CFCDN Proxy:

A CloudFlare private proxy subscription link provided by one of the maintainers of these rules, @天命 (Tianming).

  • jsDelivr:

An official accelerated subscription link from jsDelivr, with fast access speed, updated approximately once a week, and relatively high reliability.

  • ghproxy Proxy:

A proxy for GitHub raw, with faster update speed, but average reliability.

AdGuard Home/DNS Subscription Links ​

  • GitHub Raw Subscription

  • Microsoft CDN Proxy Subscription

  • jsDelivr(gcore) Proxy Subscription

  • ghproxy Proxy Subscription

Hosts Subscription Links (Compatible with Xposed Purification) ​

  • GitHub Raw Subscription

  • Microsoft CDN Proxy Subscription

  • jsDelivr(gcore) Proxy Subscription

  • ghproxy Proxy Subscription

Clash Meta Subscription Links ​

  • GitHub Raw Subscription

  • Microsoft CDN Proxy Subscription

  • jsDelivr(gcore) Proxy Subscription

  • ghproxy Proxy Subscription

For specific syntax format, please refer to Usage Tutorial

Surge/Surfboard Subscription Links ​

  • GitHub Raw Subscription

  • Microsoft CDN Proxy Subscription

  • jsDelivr(gcore) Proxy Subscription

  • ghproxy Proxy Subscription

More Rule Formats ​

AWAvenue Ads Rule - Supplementary Rule Subscription Links     What is a supplementary rule?

  • GitHub Raw Subscription

  • Microsoft CDN Proxy Subscription

  • jsDelivr(gcore) Proxy Subscription

  • ghproxy Proxy Subscription

    Tips: "AWAvenue Ads Rule - Supplementary Rule" provides subscription links only for "AdGuard Home/DNS." For other formats, please convert them yourself.

AdClose Subscription Links (Currently only for developers, as AdClose already includes these rules (in the Block section))

  • GitHub Raw Subscription

  • Tianming CFCDN Proxy Subscription

  • jsDelivr(gcore) Proxy Subscription

  • ghproxy Proxy Subscription

QuantumultX Subscription Links (.list format)

  • GitHub Raw Subscription

  • Tianming CFCDN Proxy Subscription

  • jsDelivr(gcore) Proxy Subscription

  • ghproxy Proxy Subscription

Mosdns V5 Subscription Links

  • GitHub Raw Subscription

  • Tianming CFCDN Proxy Subscription

  • jsDelivr(gcore) Proxy Subscription

  • ghproxy Proxy Subscription

RouterOS Subscription Links (divided into 240.0.0.1 and Adlist 0.0.0.0 formats)

  • GitHub Raw Subscription (240.0.0.1)

  • Tianming CFCDN Proxy Subscription (240.0.0.1)

  • jsDelivr(gcore) Proxy Subscription (240.0.0.1)

  • ghproxy Proxy Subscription (240.0.0.1)

  • GitHub Raw Subscription (Adlist)

  • Tianming CFCDN Proxy Subscription (Adlist)

  • jsDelivr(gcore) Proxy Subscription (Adlist)

  • ghproxy Proxy Subscription (Adlist)

Singbox Subscription Links

  • GitHub Raw Subscription

  • Tianming CFCDN Proxy Subscription

  • jsDelivr(gcore) Proxy Subscription

  • ghproxy Proxy Subscription

  • GitHub Raw Subscription (REGEX)

  • Tianming CFCDN Proxy Subscription (REGEX)

  • jsDelivr(gcore) Proxy Subscription (REGEX)

  • ghproxy Proxy Subscription (REGEX)
